markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Endure](/Spells.aspx?ID=573)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Arazni](/Deities.aspx?ID=31), [Arazni](/Deities.aspx?ID=31), [Arqueros](/Deities.aspx?ID=244), [Fandarra](/Deities.aspx?ID=236), [Folgrit](/Deities.aspx?ID=87), [Narakaas](/Deities.aspx?ID=143), [Narakaas](/Deities.aspx?ID=143), [The Last Breath](/Deities.aspx?ID=270), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=91)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

You invigorate the touched creature’s mind and urge it to press on. You grant the touched creature 5 temporary Hit Points.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the temporary Hit Points by 5.
name: Endure
